text:
Platterz Inc. | Software Engineer | Toronto, Canada | Full-time | Onsite

Platterz is looking for a Software Developer to work out of its Toronto office. Platterz is the first platform to make it easy to order catered food for the office. We help customers discover delicious food from the cityâ€™s best restaurants and caterers, and order shareable meals for team lunches, client meetings, and special events.

Our stack: Ruby on Rails, Angular on Typescript, PostgreSQL

More info: https://www.platterz.ca/c/careers/
